de.systemagmbh.tools.logger.writer.screen
Class CSysScreenWriter

java.lang.Object
  de.systemagmbh.tools.logger.writer.ASysLogWriter
      de.systemagmbh.tools.logger.writer.screen.CSysScreenWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISysComponent, ISysLogWriter
public class CSysScreenWriter
extends ASysLogWriter

This class represents a special type of ISysLogger that logs to stdout.

Version:
$Revision: 1.4 $
Author:
Udo Friedrich

openWriter

protected void openWriter()
Open the writer.

close

public void close()
Close the screen logger.
The super.close() method is not called here, because this would be the end of all screen logging. That is, no System.out.println() anymore. Here it is done without closing the wirter.

Specified by:
close in interface ISysLogWriter
Overrides:
close in class ASysLogWriter
